short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chatr leverages HOPR's mixnet to provide a secure and private way to chat and send tokens straight from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chatr! is a fully private chat built on top of HOPR's mixnet. Chatr provide a secure and private way to chat and send tokens bundled in a simple to use web extension.
